verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: Melania Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: that she would make anti - bullying her primary focus] , everyone laughed and suggested that she start by telling her husband to stop being a bully first . Now she ’s put out a booklet on the matter to guide parents and teens — and it ’s a verbatim copy of a booklet put out by …
